Perplexity_research.name: Perplexity_research
Perplexity_research.description: Calls Perplexity.ai agent to perform online research.

parameters.name: researchTask
parameters.description: The comprehensive, detailed task to for the AI agent with online research capabilities to answer.

parameters.name: saveToMemory
parameters.description: If the response should be saved to the agent memory.

Perplexity_research.returns: If saveToMemory is true then returns the memory key. If saveToMemory is false then returns the research contents.

Perplexity_webSearch.name: Perplexity_webSearch
Perplexity_webSearch.description: Performs a web search using Perplexity's search API.
Perplexity_webSearch.returns: The search results with titles, URLs, snippets.
